website_summaries.verdict: A soft and luxurious-feeling topper with excellent quality.
pros: Perfect if you are looking for a more plush-feeling memory foam topper
It also stands out for its gel-infusion, which some report helps them feel cooler during the night
cons: A few owners say that this topper loses support over time

customer_reviews.title: Brought couch cushions back to life
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Linenspa memory foam before. I like how quickly it puffs up out of the package and bounces back from use. I bought this 2” to firm up the back cushions on a couch. See pics. I just cut the memory foam to size and stuff it on the back side of the cushions. I have done this a few times before and it has lasted over 2 years and counting. I have also used their 3” for a padded headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Joelyn Kitzmiller

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: Topper was not nearly as well made as I'd hoped or expected. This was the sixth time I've purchased a foam topper and had been completely thrilled with all of my previous purchases. This one was extremely lightweight-to the point that it sank right through to the surface you'd placed it on as soon as any weight whatsoever was placed upon it. After ONE night of gentle ordinary use, the topper tore in numerous places simply from the act of us trying to roll it up for storage for the day. I am extremely disappointed and would strongly discourage anyone from purchasing this product!
customer_reviews.author: MissyLue

customer_reviews.title: Such a let down, hot and goes flat
customer_reviews.text: I find the 5 star reviews troublesome. This mattress topper is indeed 2 inches however that was the only thing this company didn't lie about. It is not cooling as advertised, it traps so much heat both my husband and myself are literally sweating in our bed at night (my husband is 6ft 210lbs mostly muscle and I'm 5'4" 98lbs). The topper is extremely plush, which is what we were looking for however this topper goes completely flat once you lay on it and offers zero support.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: Nothing better than sleeping on a gel foam topper. Like sleeping on a cloud. I had a 3 inch but this 2 inch feels the same so no need to go with a bulky 3 inch
customer_reviews.author: sandyjojo

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the topper is very poor
customer_reviews.text: We bought this topper in July. After sleeping on it for a couple days, the topper cracked as shown in the photo. We never had this issue with any of our previous toppers or mattresses. The quality was so poor that it was almost a disposable topper.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This completely transformed my son's mattress! He no longer wakes up in the middle of the night and I can comfortably lay with him until he falls asleep. I like this product so much, we will likely buy one for our king bed too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Works great for an over-firm mattress.
customer_reviews.text: When our original Tempur-Pedic mattress failed, we replaced it, under warranty, with their firmest mattress, the "Contour Supreme." (They said it was closest in firmness to the original). This thing is WAY firmer than the original--we refer to it, semi-affectionately, as "the concrete slab." But instead of hassling with the Tempur-Pedic folks---(a HUGE hassle)--we opted to try this--the Linenspa 2" mattress topper, and it works great! Softens up the ultra firm mattress perfectly, and we are noticing a better night's sleep immediately. Seems to be of high quality, although it has no cover. Highly recommended to soften up a decent quality mattress that is too firm!
customer_reviews.author: Rubilips

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful topper. Very comfortable. Still in good shape. Accurate size too, it is actually 2 inches. It only took 24 hours to stop having that horrible plastic wrap smell. But, that is the price of memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Gave new life to my mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to purchase a new top quality mattress. Decided to try to this product first, since the mattress is not even 3 years old. Even on evenings where I'm exhausted, I couldn't stay comfortable on my mattress. I would sleep maybe 2 hours, wake up and shift around for almost a half-hour, from then on repeat. After putting this on, I'm very comfortable the moment I lie down on it and I'm often asleep within minutes and stay asleep throughout the night. Definitely didn't regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Adan Valdivia

customer_reviews.title: 3 months later, and it still feels like the first night
customer_reviews.text: I've had this topper for 3 months now, and it's still incredibly comfortable. It hasn't sagged or indented or anything. When I bought it, there was a slight odor but it dissipated quickly. The smell didn't bother me enough to not sleep on it, but it was noticeable. This topper turned my firm mattress into the perfect comfort. Highly recommended :)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Transformed hard bed into sleeping luxury!,
customer_reviews.text: Great value for an excellent memory foam topper. We put it on top of an Ikea mattress and it turned that uncomfortable bed into luxury.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Not only does the 2-inch topper dramatically increase the comfort of your mattress. A benefit I never would have never thought of this pad has provided. For those with grandchildren who have those accidents in the middle of the night. The foam is so dense it stayed dry, blotted with a dry towel. Then a quick wipe with a Lysol towel, put clean bedding back on everyone back to sleep. With nothing left to do of trying to air out a mattress for the whole next day.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Must get
customer_reviews.text: I have to say i love it ,it made my bed feel ilke sleeping on the clouds i just love it
customer_reviews.author: Capeles

customer_reviews.title: This mattress topper is like sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: This mattress topper is like sleeping on a cloud. Nicely dense, barely a trace of odor for the first day, just like they promised. It really makes a difference on painful pressure points when side-sleeping and gives me nice back support too!
customer_reviews.author: MBE

customer_reviews.title: ... favorable bed setup this really helped us get a better night sleep
customer_reviews.text: Less than favorable bed setup this really helped us get a better night sleep. Would totally buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Very hot!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very hot and messed my back up even worse than it was. Dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: G. Richburg

customer_reviews.title: 2 inches is the perfect amount of cushion I needed to add to my ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 inches was too much. 2 inches is the perfect amount of cushion I needed to add to my bed.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy does have smell for a few days as they mentioned but it was a perfect fit and worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: This gel infused memory foam topper is very cheap quality! This is low of the low quality mattress topper! I have a super cheap one that I got for under $20.00 from my local Wal-Mart and it's a million times better quality than this one. Also arrived with tears already in it and the little blue beads of gel are literally falling out of it. The mattress topper is full of holes from were the gel beads have fallen out. This is a safety hazard for me because I have pets and don't want them ingesting the gel beads that are all over my house. Can't say enough bad things about it.
customer_reviews.author: ray87

customer_reviews.title: This thing makes me crazy...
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the worst purchases I have ever made on Amazon. I got it based on the great reviews. I needed something to make the mattress more comfortable where I am temporarily staying, as I am disabled and prone to pressure sores. I hate this thing. It bunches up, won't lay flat, and doesn't seem to have much padding at all. I bought a cover for it, and though the cover is larger than the pad itself, it curls up in the corners. I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Walker

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my king size mattress that just isn't as supportive as it used to be. I absolutely ADORE this topper. It's the perfect mix of comfortable and supportive. So happy I got this, I am sleeping so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing this review so other people can know what I wish someone would have told me before buying this. First of all this foam does not breath meaning you will sweat and get hot on it. But that’s not the worse problem. There is these blue powder that keeps coming out of it. I am using a protector and a sheet on top but these sugar like blue dots passes through it and gets all over my skin. Who knows what kind of chemical these are made of. I just wish someone told me before buying this.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: This is a VERY low density topper. Weighing in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a VERY low density topper. Weighing in at 9# 5oz (queen size), it's less than a 2# density topper. The first few nights we used it, it was ok, but we've found after a few weeks of use, it provides little to no support. By morning, it's paper thin under/around where you're laying down. Will be ordering one that's higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: 124XL

customer_reviews.title: Not a significant difference
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this foam pad purchase would make a difference in the comfort of my mattress and unfortunately it did not. Maybe I should have gone thicker but it does get pricey therefore I was hoping this Amazon recommended product would work. I don’t want to go through the hassle of returning such a large item so I’m stuck with it, but I wanted to share some feedback about my experience. This purchase was a waste for me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Pedroza

customer_reviews.title: Good, but can get pretty hot as you sleep
customer_reviews.text: While this mattress pad definitely improved the comfort of the bed and feels very comfortable to lie, it really holds body heat and can make it uncomfortable to sleep for that reason. My husband actually doesn’t notice the heat problem, so he just thinks it’s pretty comfortable, but I it’s very noticeable to me. I’d recommend it to people who are not very sensitive about temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla C.

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR IT'S TOTALLY USELESS !!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I've had it "open" for about 72 hours now and this is what it looks like. It's better than it was immediately after unwrapping it, but everything I read indicated it should take less than 24 hours. Good thing i didnt need it right away. I'll give it a little more time, but at this point i would say look for another one to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Sisson

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 94 year old Dad. He’s in an Assusted living and has a very uncomfortable hospital bed. I brought it over on Friday and Saturday early am he called me saying how great a nights sleep he had. I was so happy to hear that and I’m sure he will continue having many good nights. I bought the twin size for the hospital bed and it fits perfectly. I may be buying another for our queen size bed because my husband is always complaining our mattress is very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia D.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Stained, too firm, very light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I should have known by its light weight that this would be disappointing. After I unrolled it on the mattress, I noticed there was a large stained/discolored area. It is not plush or supportive like I had hoped. It doesn’t compare to other mattress toppers I have. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: cblue

customer_reviews.title: Much better rest
customer_reviews.text: Made my bed so much easier to sleep on. expands to size fast and easy. I don't notice any smell that other reviews said.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: 10 days then permanently indented to body.
customer_reviews.text: Far too soft. Once it stopped returning to it's original form, leaving the indentation of my body...not bouncing back...full lower back pain began again. If I can get it back in the box.....I will return it. I got about 10 days before it stopped bouncing back.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: we bit the bullet and purchased a pretty decent memory foam-based mattress online
customer_reviews.text: A couple months ago, we bit the bullet and purchased a pretty decent memory foam-based mattress online. It's extremely comfortable and medium-firm, but I was starting to get back pain. The manufacturer suggest I purchase a mattress topper from them for $300. Decided to give this a try first and it definitely relieves pressure points, and my first few nights have been a major improvement on my back. Only downside is that it feels much warmer in bed. Not sure if I buy the claims about the "gel infusion" cooling technology. Seems a bit like they threw some blue dye in and called it a day.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wu

customer_reviews.title: Is it supposed to make it worse?!
customer_reviews.text: Ummm is it supposed to make the bed less comfortable? We have had it two nights and I’m in decidedly more pain. What’s weird is that it actually creates the feeling of sleeping in a divot whereas before there wasn’t one. I’ve had toppers before so I’m not really sure what’s going on with this one. I ordered because it had so many positive reviews but now I’m confused. Was really hoping it was going to be comfortable and it just isn’t. I knew I had to leave a review when my husband (who never complains) just asked if he is supposed to have new pain that he didn’t have before! Ughhhhh.
customer_reviews.author: GHF

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new guest bed and then got sick so went to stay in the guest room but the mattress was too firm for me. Made my back and hips ache. This topper allows me to sleep in the guest room comfortably. You’ll sink in nicely, but not too much. This topper is for someone who prefers plush to firm. No smell at all when unpackaging.
customer_reviews.author: L099

customer_reviews.title: Linespa Gel Infused Memory Foam mattress topper improves your sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Linenspa 2 inch Gel infused Memory Foam Pad. It was just what I needed for my full size bed. After the first night of sleeping with it on my bed I had no back ache the next morning. I first heard of it and used it at my son's house, My daughter in law had bought one for the twin guest room and I loved it . Came home and ordered on for myself. Thanks Amazon for the products you sell. Would recommend this to anyone that wants to improve the older mattress as I did or just to have a better night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Nana C

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had this topper before and it was great for a couple years and ok for another year or two. I expected it to last 3 yrs or so and got that so was happy and ordered its replacement. I've had it for 2 months and I've had to rotate it already. I sleep alone, on my back and don't move. The foam just hasn't held up at all. I don't know if the foam didn't cure properly or if the quality is just much worse across the board. It felt great for the first couple of weeks only.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Bummer. Made zero difference for my mattress. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Bummer. Made zero difference for my mattress. I had experienced an incredible mattress topper once, and the foam was kind of a "egg crate" texture/shape. Maybe the egg crate feel is what I needed. But this topper made zero difference.
customer_reviews.author: Hill Staffer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, and expands well.
customer_reviews.text: Used on the sofabed in the RV. Took a few hours to expand, but we lived through it. Rolls up enough to keep in sofa storage. We have several for several cabin sofabeds (different brand) and there is a bit of a difference between them. There are no comfort zones with this topper, so it does move a little when you roll at night, but didn’t work it’s way off the edge of the sofabed so it was ok. Also doesnt have the odor control. But we also didn’t pay as much as the other brand used in the cabin. We are happy with the product for the RV when the kids come to stay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cooling gel?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this topper for the sole reason that I wanted to be cooler while sleeping on my new memory foam mattress. I don't see a difference in body temp, but kept the pad because I figure it provides a barrier between my body and my new mattress as far as the sweating goes. It is very soft and does not smell, but not at all as advertised as far as cooling goes.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Twain

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped to extend the life of my 7 year old memory foam mattress, which I guess is starting to get compressed in the middle. I wake up with back pain after a couple of hours. It was a very firm mattress to begin with, sometimes causing my thigh to go to sleep. I sleep on my side. It seems like a quality product, but it did not help my back problem at all. Also, I did not feel as if it offered any cooling versus the mattress alone. I used it with the same high quality mattress pad that I have been using with the mattress alone.
customer_reviews.author: KY Jamz

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing.
customer_reviews.text: It did not smell as bad as other reviewers warned. It was the correct size of the bed. Did not hang over or come up short. I could tell immediately that I was sinking into the bed when laying on it. The reason we wanted to try it, was because my hip would hurt when waking up in the morning. (side sleeper). With the 2” of foam, my hip does not dig into the mattress. It feels cozy. I like the feeling of slowly sinking.Happy.
customer_reviews.author: S.B.G

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Support
customer_reviews.text: After spending three years in a country where the mattresses are thinner than this pad, I was surprised I even thought about getting a pad in the US. The mattress pad is one of my better purchases. I was able to use it thr day after it arrived (a prior review mentioned the plastic smell, but I have not had that problem) and it has made a world of difference. Great product, arrived quickly, and was in a container small enough for me to carry with no problems. I've always had problems sleeping, this mattress has definitely helped. My back hasn't hurt once upon waking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I wasn’t expecting much with this topper. It was inexpensive, and we just needed something to top our very hard and uncomfortable- honestly very painful, fifth wheel mattress. Figured it was worth a try. Low expectations... and then we took it on a 2 week camping trip. And I slept the best I’ve slept in years. Totally blown away at how comfortable the 2” topper is. All my pain disappeared. Now ordering one for the bed at home. It was easy to put on the bed- unlike some toppers we’ve had. Light weight. Also, no smell to it. Just left it to breath for a couple days before we used it.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Has no cooling effect whatsoever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely zero cooling effect. I've had cooling pillows, cooling sheets, cooling mattresses etc etc over the years and some work better than others, and all of them fade with their cooling effect over time. But this mattress pad had no cooling effect and actually leaves me hotter than not using it at all. False advertising! It's comfortable to lay on, but does not do what it claims. I'd love to return it, but I threw the box away and there is no way I could fit it back in the box anyway. Save yourself some money and buy a different product.
customer_reviews.author: blackbird

customer_reviews.title: Does just what I was hoping it would do
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mattress topper. Bought this to put on top of the futon for an overnight guest. I put this foam topper on top of the futon cushion, and then put a mattress pad on top of the whole thing. It turns what was just a so-so place to sleep into a very comfortable bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, it contours to my body and supports it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Very comfortable, it contours to my body and supports it beautifully. The instructions say to unpack it and let it expand and air out for 24 hrs. Mine was ready to use in 4 hours and had no discernable odor right out of the box. It also arrived in less than 24 hrs. after ordering, using 2 day Prime shipping. A very small quibble is that the corners are cut at 90 degrees and most mattresses have rounded corners, so fitting sheets is a little awkward. A minor annoyance. This pad is so comfortable I have a hard time getting up in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: ERIK HOLMQUIST

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but definitely not cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because our new mattress was too firm. I'm a side sleeper and I was waking up with shoulder pain. This topper fixed that problem, but it is definitely not "cooling." My wife and I both wake up sweaty. We've had this a year and we're probably going to replace it. It was good in the winter months but it's not going to work for another summer. Docked it two stars because it does not meet its description of "cooling." Not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: We bought this for our daughter who complained that her ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter who complained that her mattress was too firm. We are so impressed with the topper and she loves it and sleeps so well now! I wish we bought it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Scott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing difference in sleep quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Since surgery a few years ago, I had always awoken with sore lower back and stiff hip joints. Tried a few different fancy mattresses but complaints remained. So, what the heck, let’s try this inexpensive topper. Well, the first night it changed everything. I now sleep in relative comfort with no sore back and hips each morning. Have also been able to stop use of sleep aid medication as this topper keeps me comfortable and pain free all night. I don’t ask how it works, I accept small miracles!
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great..comfy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a Queen size so we could cut in half and use for the two bunks in our camper. Worked perfectly! The foam is thick and helps add some cushion to the terrible bunk mattresses. So far the kids love it and say the bunks are much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LLMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice little Topper
customer_reviews.text: I use this on top of our RV mattress that was very uncomfortable. Even at only 2” thick, it has made a considerable improvement. We’ve only used it a dozen or so times so I can’t really speak to it’s longevity, but it seems okay to me. There is a slight odor when you first unpack it, but it’s not too bad and fades pretty quickly. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Carefulbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress topper for my daughter to use at college, and she loves it! I originally got her a cheaper/thinner one, but it wasn’t working out. She started experiencing back pain and was having trouble sleeping (college dorm beds are the worst). As soon as she started using this topper she said she felt a tremendous difference; back pain eased up, and sleeping better. Only wish I would have gotten this for her from the beginning instead of opting for a cheaper version.
customer_reviews.author: Joann A.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for nursing home bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 3" memory form mattress topper for my mother's bed in the nursing home. Before I bought this, she was in so much pain from sleeping in the flimsy hospital bed. The first time she laid on the bed with the mattress topper she was immediately thrilled. Mom continued to tell me how wonderful the topper was and what a difference it was making. I'm happy my mom will get a good night sleep and less pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our RV fold out couch because the shape of the couch was obvious when sleeping on it. One night on this pad, and we purchased 2 more for the other beds because the entire family was fighting over who would get to sleep on it. It's amazing and hides the imperfections of the couch. We love it! It's extremely comfortable. It's a little cumbersome to store, but I'm hoping to get some straps to wrap around it to keep it compact for storage reasons.
customer_reviews.author: photogirlHW09

customer_reviews.title: Loving my sleep time more
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait to review this product after having it for some time. My husband and I are rough sleepers and our mattress is getting a little order. When we put this memory foam pad on, it made a huge difference in the quality of our sleep. I look forward to sinking into bed every night. It's cushy, but firm enough to where you don't feel like you're falling into the middle of the bed. We absolutely love it and would be willing to order another in the future, although I imagine this one will last us a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Messer

customer_reviews.title: Daily neck and back pain.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both wake up with back and neck pains after putting the 3 inch topper on our 6 month old mattress (it’s comfortable, just hot). We tried it for three weeks and couldn’t take it anymore and removed the topper. This topper is too soft and cannot support weight very well and evenly. It compresses completely by our shoulders making it seem like we’re on a really thick pillow causing our necks to kink regardless of the laying position. We are both in our early 30s and are active. But my 2 year old lab even struggles to get off the bed after laying on it for a few minutes. Stay clear of the 3 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Little topper, low price but Huge difference!
customer_reviews.text: Love this topper. The bed in our furnished rental is horribly uncomfortable, way too firm. I was walking up nightly with pain in my hips and low back. Ever since aging this topper all the pain is gone! We pulled it out of the box and used it the same night after only a couple of hours of letting it puff up. Absolutely no bad smell. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Description of Product is a Lie
customer_reviews.text: The only thing this topper does that it claims is its soft, which isnt even a good thing bc you sink into a giant crater while laying on it. I have no idea what cooling gel tech they are talking about because I have woken up dripping in sweat ever since I've own this. I also have really bad hip and back problems and it DOES NOT even out pressure points like it claims. Very upset will be requesting a return after this review. WASTE OF MONEY IF YOU BUY IT FOR ANYTHING OTHER THAN SOFTNESS
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Clippert

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dorm room mattress. I previously had used two cheap eggshell mattress toppers from Walmart and a plush mattress topper, but that's not nearly as comfortable as this. I had that on my mattress at first as I procrastinated on buying this. Once you take it out of the package, they say to let it open up for at least 24-48 hours. However, in my fairly small room, that wasn't really feasible. I let it air out for about 12-14 hours, then put it on my mattress and slept on it. It's been fine since then. I can't speak to the durability since I've only had it about a month, but it's super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: STiLL so good
customer_reviews.text: Update with use: STILL pleased with my purchase- NO odor. Very supportive and soft memory foam- thick and no product defects with use. I purchased 2. Both took about 2hrs to fully inflate. They do give off an odor and I will update as the smell dissipates. Both my toppers arrived with no issues- and are perfect! Very lush and thick. Very pleased! Will update with use!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: OK for Most Not Me !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to the Great Reviews........No doubt it is me but all it is I find is a 2 inch piece of Memory Foam which I already have on my mattress so essentially it adds more foam with no real improvement in comfort............The more I see and buy Memory Foam Products the less I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Z.

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable but no temperature control :(
customer_reviews.text: This topper is so incredibly comfortable it’s exactly what I’ve been looking for. It gives me lots of support for my back, especially my lower back. But there is absolutely no temperature control with this topper. It contains so much heat that it’s almost unbearable. I got the 2 inch topper and I will be keeping it but I need to figure out a way to tolerate the heat from it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 inch highly suggested over 3 inch
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the 3-inch version of this mattress pad. I'm a 135 pound person, and even I felt myself sinking in too far, to the point that it felt like I was rolling "up" when I rolled to the side. I imagine it would be even worse for those that are heavier or are sharing a bed. Thankfully I was able to return it and get the 2-inch version. Much better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: Poor buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the third topper I have bought, first and last of this one. In more expensive ones I found when they are new it's hard to turn so I don't toss and turn. This one had no friction. If I sleep on my side I wake up with hip pain, I also toss and turn. It's like nothing us there
customer_reviews.author: Brettgirl

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother for Christmas. He complained previously of sciatica, lower back pain, and aching hips and joints. He has done taxing physical labor and heavy lifting for many years. He complains of frequent discomfort and lack of sleep. So, about a week after he received his gift he called to say he needs to either get rid of mattress or quit his job so he can sleep more. He said, “ I love it. It is amazing, I lay down and just float in a cushion of comfort”. He reports his sleep is massively improved and he is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: acwibw

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible 4 nights. I think I got a total of 10 hrs of quality sleep in the 4 nights I had this topper. Everything hurts, my neck, my back, my legs. I don’t know if I can correctly say what makes it so uncomfortable but I think it comes from your body being sunk in a hole in the middle of the bed. I was really excited to get this topper as everyone was swearing by it. But it must be a case of the typical ‘paid reviews’..
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Schiefer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my wife as one of her Christmas gifts. She loves it. I like it as well, but the mattress we have never bothered me before I bought this item. As long as I have a pillow, I can fall sleep on the floor. Temperature wise, It does feel warmer for me at night. Using less covers at night solves the issue for me. My wife doesn't feel any difference temperature wise. She's already thanked me twice for getting this item since we started using it. I guess my contract has been extended for another year.
customer_reviews.author: P’atak

customer_reviews.title: Good for back pain
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old has scoliosis. She wakes up with back pain every morning. Since I bought this to put on her bed she's been feeling a lot better. I also have a 4 inch mattress topper under it. Her bed feels like heaven. Ordering one for myself. *edit* I have placed a non slip mattress pad under it. It kept slipping off. That works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kags

customer_reviews.title: This topper is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress topper is amazing! Within 15-30 minutes of opening it was already the perfect size and ready to put on my mattress. I’ve seen negative reviews but something tells me they weren’t careful when they opened the packaging. You just can’t start slicing up the plastic as it’s wrapped air tight and you have to be very careful. The comfort is amazing. It truly feels like you are laying on a cloud. I absolutely love it and I’m so glad I made the purchase. Don’t believe the bad reviews as this is outstanding!!! I bought the 3” twin xl.
customer_reviews.author: Spiritual Gangsta Girl

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted to like this because of the fact that if it did, it would save me money on a pricy mattress topper. BUT unfortunately, you get what you pay for. For those that positively reviewed this product, I am genuinely confused and would assume it is not slept on frequently. We tried to use this for nightly sleep on our two year old firm mattress and it was so uncomfortable. We took it off after three days because it kept rolling up in parts and the SMELL was so chemically. Made me want to barf. We have a baby and all the little blue beads that kept falling out also made me nervous.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline’s Reviews

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: After 5 nights of use I love it. It's like night and day. Really wish I had purchased one sooner. I'm on the heavier side too (about 290lbs) so it'll support most people. The odor was a very slight odor out of the box, but by the time I went to work and came back it was gone.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This topper was way to thick and extremely uncomfortable. It offered no support which causes you to sink into it. I bought it based on the stars it was given and normally that usually is accurate, not in this case. Don’t waste you’re money like I did. I was not happy with it and emailed them to return it and I had spoken with someone and they were supposed to email me how to ship it back seeing as it was vacuum packed and wouldn’t fit in the box. They never did send packaging or refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: Tbonia

customer_reviews.title: It's all relative
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for 4 months and it is an amazing gel foam pad. The picture I took is straight out of the box. I did not experience any of the issues other reviews were having with wrinkles or damages. If you are someone who loved a pillow/cloud like sleeping surface you will love this mattress topper. My husband has not complained about waking up in pain since we bought it. I on the other hand am not a huge fan, but I also like a more firm surface. It certainly does what it is intended to do. I would recommend this to someone wanting a softer but stable mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: No bad smell. Perfect DORM ROOM gear.
customer_reviews.text: These expanded quickly. There was no notable off-gassing or bad smell. Although it looks fully expanded right away, more still is happening because after a couple days you will find it's firmer than the first day. Item arrived without defect, perfectly sized for the bed. It doesn't move around on the bed too much. Perfect for the college dorm bed. Cheap, effective, comfortable, easy to transport. As good as a more expensive option. Save yourself some cash. Buy this one for your college kid instead of the expensive topper.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: On the thin side, but soft!
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact that it’s very soft. Dislike that it sometimes make you sweat and not thick as I thought it would be. Next time I’ll order a thicker one. But overall, I’ve had it now for about a month and it’s pretty good so far. *Update* it’s now been 2 months now and it has torn on one side. Definitely expected this to have lasted longer. I will not buy this again nor do I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: I’m not even sure how this product got any good reviews! It ripped right out of the package, so thought well I can still use it, just turn if upside down. It’s for the guest room, but slept on it just to try it out! Nothing at all like my other mattress foams, it lays completely flat! Please don’t waste you money. It’s practically impossible to rewrap and return so guess I have to eat it on this one. I’ll be very curious to see how the seller responds!
customer_reviews.author: K Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, pain-free sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t afford a new king sized mattress. I shopped for mattress toppers and decided on this one. It’s absolutely worth every penny! I have lower back problems and spend all day on my feet,l walking 6-7 miles! Well, sleeping at night on this not only renewed my mattress but stopped my morning back pain! My only regret? That I didn’t buy it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have an older matress and box spring that was uncomfortable. This product has made my bed so much more comfortable. I wake pain free and well rested. The price was great half of what Wal Mart was asking for a comparable product. I would highly recommend. Thank you : )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive skin I would not recommend this at all. I experienced a horrible allergic reaction to I’m assuming some sort of chemical they treated it with and/or the “cooling gel”. Have been dealing with painful itching all over my body, but especially on my feet and back, for the last few days and finally realized the only thing that’s changed was adding this topper to my bed. Removed the topper, washed all my sheets, and the itching is FINALLY subsiding. I’ve had other foam mattress toppers before with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this gel topper for my RV. I also bought a 3 inch mattress topper to go on top of it. Wow, it's like heaven laying on my bed now! My new Rv came with THE worst king size mattress and I was going to throw it out and buy a new one. Someone suggested buying this gel topper so I thought I'd try it before spending a fortune on a new mattress. I am so glad I did. It has turned the worst sleeping conditions into something so amazing and comfortable I can hardly wait to go to bed at night!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie S.

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a marshmallow
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace a cheaper memory foam topper I bought at one of the big-box stores. This thing came vacuum sealed and puffed up to it's full size in minutes, even the flatter parts. It also retains it's shape instantly. I don't think this topper is going to collapse under me anytime soon. After combining it with a pillow top cover I've transformed my cheap 6 inch memory foam mattress into a luxurious bed that I don't want to get out of in the morning. My spine feels so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Beck

customer_reviews.title: Once the weather gets warm, this product is MISERABLE :(
customer_reviews.text: I should have taken advice from friends saying that foam toppers are awful, however all the reviews said otherwise. This product was nice when the weather was colder, but now that the weather is warm in Colorado, this mattress is MUCH hotter than a normal mattress is. I HATE IT. I would like a refund because it's unusable. I'm really disappointed in this purchase especially because it's such a large item and I really wanted to make my mattress more comfortable. I would like the seller to contact me about this. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: James Harper

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised. Cheap blue colored regular foam.
customer_reviews.text: First off, although it didn't advertise as having a cover, I've never seen a mattress topper that didn't come with a cover. Second, it's not a full 2" as advertised, and it appears to be simply blue colored regular foam, not the dense memory foam that is usually used for a mattress topper. You get what you pay for! Edit: I was right. This foam is just sprayed blue. The color is wearing off after only a couple months. This is NOT gel infused, it's merely painted blue foam.
customer_reviews.author: kjy2010

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Mattress topper
customer_reviews.text: I used this gel infused mattress topper to improve the comfort of my queen size mattress. Shipping box was light and easy to work with. All u need to do is roll out the topper and let it lay flat. Mine only required about 2 hours to shape it self. It's easy to select the size/thickness needed. It used with present mattress and a newer bedframe. (eliminated older bulky box spring) There is very little odor in product when u take it out of the box. If u find the smell annoying use a common fabric refresher. This is definitely a comfy sleep item.
customer_reviews.author: LL35

customer_reviews.title: 3 inch is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I slept like a baby last night on the 3 inch pad. I've seen people complaining about the "heat" and I have no idea what they are talking about. I prefer staying as cool as the cool side of a pillow and I LOVED the pad and didn't notice any heat. Also the 3 inch was perfect for me since I like squishy beds. This pad provided just enough support while still holding me like a little baby floating on a foam cloud sculpted by the gods. This pad is the best for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Conner Hein

customer_reviews.title: FIBERGLASS..DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this rating a zero, I would! This topper definitely had fiberglass. It made my skin so itchy that even after a couple of days, my skin was inflamed and irritated. My nose was also irritated and made it difficult to breathe. I've never had a reaction like this before nor do I have particularly sensitive skin or allergies. It was obviously returned immediately, but it's ridiculous that they would allow something like this to be used in a mattress topper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t get past the smell: trouble breathing
customer_reviews.text: Okay I’m fairly certain most of these good reviews are fake. I’ve had mine airing out all day, finally it’s about time for bed so I loaded my sheets on and tried to lay down. Nope! 10 mins in, I’m feeling it in my throat, the chemical smell still super thick. I just ripped it off my bed and put it on the front porch. Total Bs. Checked one of those review authenticity sites and it gave these comments a D for reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Slept so Well
customer_reviews.text: I slept so well last night. Tip: You need to let the topper rise after taking it out of the box. It took only a few hours (2-3) to inflate. I woke up pain-free...still in bed as I type this review. Tip #2: Please DO NOT sleep on this without placing covers on it. I saw some folks and some pics on their reviews...I put my mattress protector (pad) on top of this and then my normal sheets (i.e. fitted, flat, the works). Worth the purchase for now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for back pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly what a life saver! We recently purchased our first memory foam mattress. Husband likes firm and I like a medium. So we got the firm thinking it would be okay for since its memory foam. NOPE. I started having horrible lower right back pain that would wake me at all hours of the night. After reading the reviews I decided to try this before replacing the entire mattress. The reviews arent lying. After 2 nights on this I woke up finally with no back pain!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla D. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on my hard dorm bed. Let me tell you, it makes a huge difference. Compared with some other brands I have seen this is extremely affordable as well. Being a heavier guy, I sometimes wish that it was a bit thicker, but given the price, I could just buy another and stack it on top. Only real difference between this and one 5 times the price, from what I can tell, is that the more expensive one is two of these thick with a fabric wrapping to help it last longer. This is essentially just a sheet of memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Doug S.

customer_reviews.title: Heaven in a box
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe the immediate relief from hip and back pain. No more morning stiffness! My husband needs a supportive mattress but I was miserable. This gives me my softness without compromising the support he needs! I have bought one for all the beds in the house, kids and guest beds alike! Do not hesitate if you are looking for pain relief!!! So worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress topper
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a cloud memory foam mattress that was hurting me. The unfortunate part was I could not return it so I decided to purchase this mattress topper. What a difference. I am now sleeping and do not have pain in my shoulders anymore. So glad I purchased this topper. My only gripe is it’s not made in America.
customer_reviews.author: B.Brad

customer_reviews.title: Hot
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to what the negative reviewers are saying, I wish I had. It is true that you sink right through to the mattress. Trying to roll over means heaving yourself up 2 inches to climb out of it like quick sand. And it is HOT! Lay on it for just a minute and you can feel the heat where you are laying. It is soft and probably will help an older spring mattress, and you do kind of get used to becoming a plaster mold when you lay in it, but it is very uncomfortable heatwise.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a marshmallow.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little hot but other than that I love it! It’s super squishy and comfy and turned a brick of a bed into a cushioned brick lol. It took a good amount of time for it to fully expand. After ordering a mattress in a box just the week before, I was concerned at first when the topper didn’t immediate start to grow. I put on the heat in the room as recommended and it just a few short hours it was finally starting to grow. I would definitely recommend this topper.
customer_reviews.author: Andy M.

customer_reviews.title: 100% good. Nothing bad whatsoever!
customer_reviews.text: We've only used it for a couple nights now, but I couldn't be happier. I find myself on my back more, when usually I'd be on my side. It (almost?) feels like I'm floating in seawater. It's so comfortable. My wife's snoring is significantly quieter. She says she's waking up more rested. Is it due to this pad? Time will tell. I'm finding it easy to fall asleep. I normally have insomnia. The smell went away in a day or two. I have no cons.
customer_reviews.author: Nexus Dude

customer_reviews.title: Helped with comfort on old mattress
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old son has a much older mattress than he should. I bought this for a project that it didn’t get used for, so I offered it to him until we can update the actual mattress. He says it makes a huge difference. He’s at least 6’ 1” and about 275 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: ) the firmness and comfortability has held up surprisingly nicely. Comparing the price to other mattress toppers I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this July 13, it's now Sept 21. Still enjoying this mattress pad!! Your body heat does give it slight discoloration (but who's really looking at it anyways??) the firmness and comfortability has held up surprisingly nicely. Comparing the price to other mattress toppers I definitely would recommend this brand to anyone! My husband likes firm mattresses and I like a medium-soft. This brought us to a perfect compromise! Which certainly isn't easy to do. It's also helped minimize how uncomfortable I am when I wake up in the morning with my usual aches and pains.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but HOT
customer_reviews.text: Excellent comfort, even works for our split-king adjustable beds. However, I've tried everything from using 2 mattress covers on these gel toppers to two sets of sheets, and we still wake up literally washed down in sweat, every morning. Being that we've slept on them for a few months I am not comfortable with asking for a refund, but highly advise a blanket-thick mattress pad if you're able to find one with fitted-sheet corners.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Reached full size much faster than expected, I still gave it extra time to air out anyway. I'm so happy with this topper! I had a bed that was too soft and squishy for a while and I swapped it for a firmer mattress however it turned out to be a little too firm, I needed something that I could sink into a little while still receiving a good amount of support, adding this 2 inch topper was an absolutely perfect way to get what needed and it has definitely made a huge difference in my quality of sleep, and waking up pain free. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Impossibly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This thing is impossibly comfortable. Don't lay on it without setting a nice loud alarm. There's a great chance you're going to fall asleep and not realize it until you've missed two meetings... I've only used it 3 times, but it comes back perfectly after each use. It's also nice and cool, even in humid New England summers. It rolls decently small and I wish they sold a bag for it, as this is for our guest room pull-out.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Not a paid review - WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is definitely worth it, that’s all I can sum it up too!!! The product does seem at first glance, pricey, but I think of it more as an investment for better quality sleep. Prior to purchasing this memory foam mattress topper, I would have restless nights and sleep uncomfortably, I would sometimes even wake up with a sore neck. But since I’ve purchased this I’ve noticed that I’ve slept better and more comfortably. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who has a lumpy uncomfortable mattress, and is looking to add a little more cushion and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Linenspa 2 Inch Gel Infused Memory Foam Mattress Topper, Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style:2 Inch| Pattern Name:TopperInstantly add a comfort layer to your mattress with a Linenspa Gel Memory Foam Mattress Topper. Soft, supportive memory foam helps to relieve pressure points by distributing weight evenly. The memory foam is infused with gel that works to regulate temperature by capturing and distributing heat. Foam is CertiPUR US certified for quality standards. Plush memory foam surface revitalizes your existing mattress and prevents long term wear and tear on your mattress. Available in plush 2 inch and 3 inch profiles. This topper prevents overheating and conforms to the curves of your body to reduce aches and pains while you sleep. Available in Cal King, King, Queen, Full XL, Full, Twin XL and Twin sizes.
feature_bullets: Two inches of ultra plush memory foam that conforms to your curves and hugs you to sleep
Infused with temperature regulating gel beads that capture and dissipate heat to help prevent overheating
Comfortable memory foam distributes weight evenly to align the spine and alleviate pressure points
Available in plush 2 inch and 3 inch profiles; The 3 inch topper will hug your body more than the 2 inch topper
A comfortable and affordable way to rejuvenate an old mattress, soften a hard mattress, and prolong mattress life; Backed by a 3 year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars23,474 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
